description: Patch Plan for Proposal ID 1214 - Improve UI Interaction Coverage

operations.content:
# Test cases for new UI elements

def test_cancel_button():
    assert ui_element_exists('#bgl-confirm-no')
    click_ui_element('#bgl-confirm-no')
    assert not ui_element_exists('#bgl-confirm-no')

def test_manual_test_batch_id_input():
    assert ui_element_exists('#manualTestBatchId')
    input_text('#manualTestBatchId', '12345')
    assert get_ui_element_value('#manualTestBatchId') == '12345'
